workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the user is currently participating in.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

endpoint_node_id.name: endpoint_node_id
endpoint_node_id.description: Filters the results to circuits that terminate on the specified node_id
endpoint_node_id.validation_error_text: Parameter endpoint_node_id only accepts integer numbers.

path_node_id.name: path_node_id
path_node_id.description: Filters the results for circuits that traverse the node of the node_id given
path_node_id.validation_error_text: Parameter path_node_id only accepts integer numbers.

name: get_existing_circuits
description: returns a list of circuits for the given workgroup
